name: Shooter V.1
description:
This is a proyect that i made for an exam in my university, since i only had a month or so to work on it, and had not just this exam but a lot more of them, it was left as a prototype, at least for now, i would like to re use ideas from here, the final result testing PP really adds something else.

Inspired in the cod saga, especially the zombie mode, you will really notice that, hope you like it.

TIPS:

.This is a survival game, just like cod zombies mode, but with a final boss, it's based on 10 rounds, but you don't really need to beat all of them, it depends on how fast you reach the final boss, once you kill him, you will finish the game.

.If you fell like playing it really quick you can use the Shift + F combination, this will give you 9999 hp and infinite points to let you explore all you want and find the boss quickly.

.Since the hints in the game are written in Spanish, i will resume them for you:

1. You need to find the purple aura that is trapped and released it.

2. Once you release the purple aura, it will help you fight, but more important, he/she is the key to open the final door to fight the boss.

NOTES:

.Since this was a prototype, it will probably have some bugs, i apologize beforehand.

.Sorry that this game help/hints are in Spanish, but i had no time to change that.
